title: Silhouette America SILH 3 Silhouette Studio Business Edition Card, White
features: Swing Design ships the FULL BUSINESS EDITION Guaranteed. The reviews are for others sellers who ship a lower version.
Silhouette Studio Upgrade Card to Business Edition. Go from Studio Basic to Business. Includes Features from Designer Edition and Designer Edition Plus

This will upgrade you from Basic (the free software that you get with the machine) to Business. This software gives you everything you would get in Designer and Designer Plus along with all the added features below of the Business Software

Ability to Import and now Export (new 2017 Feature) JPG, BMP, PNG files - Image effects (b/w, tint, color saturation) - Print & Cut - Ability to use SVG files - Layers - Advanced eraser & knife features - Sketch conversion tools - Nesting feature - Basic rhinestone conversion tools - Multi-cutter functionality - Tiling - Advanced Nesting feature - Weed line options - Ai and CDR file capability
Ai and CDR file capability, Advanced Features, Text Warp Feature, and all additional features include in Designer and Designer Plus
description: Silhouette Studio Business Edition : Font access (for font files on your computer) - Ability to use JPG, BMP, PNG files - Image effects (b/w, tint, color saturation) - Print & Cut - Ability to use SVG files – Layers - Advanced eraser & knife features - Sketch conversion tools - Nesting feature - Basic rhinestone conversion tools - Multi-cutter functionality – Tiling - Advanced Nesting feature - Weed line options - Ai and CDR file capability. INSTRUCTIONS Be sure you have Silhouette Studio v1.9.0 or higher installed on your computer or download Silhouette Studio and save it to your computer.
